name: Swap SOL to WIF on Raydium
description: Detailed instructions for swapping SOL to WIF tokens using Raydium DEX on Solana
instructions: Click blue 'Connect Wallet' button on the right side of the page
Approve the connection in Phantom wallet popup
In the swap panel, locate the token dropdown button displaying 'USDC' with its logo
Click the USDC dropdown button above the Swap button
In the 'Select a token' modal, click the search bar that says 'search by token or paste address'
Click the $WIF (dogwifhat) token that appears in the center of the modal
In the 'From' section, locate the input field next to the SOL dropdown button
Click the input field and type 0.05 (or click 'MAX' or '50%' tag in the top right corner)
Click the blue 'Swap' button at the bottom of the swap panel
Review the transaction details in the confirmation modal
Approve the transaction in Phantom wallet popup
